mapper.insert: insert into userorder (order_id, user_id, op_id, order_state, order_createtime, order_time, evaluation_id, order_class, order_modelf, order_scope, order_descripe, order_address, order_contact, order_phone, order_others, order_cost, order_pollution, order_moremoney ) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderCreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{orderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{evaluationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderClass,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderModelf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderScope,jdbcType=REAL}, #{orderDescripe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderOthers,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderCost,jdbcType=REAL}, #{orderPollution,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderReport,jdbcType=BIT} )
mapper.update: update userorder set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, op_id = #{opId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_state = #{orderState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_createtime = #{orderCreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, order_time = #{orderTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, evaluation_id = #{evaluationId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_class = #{orderClass,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_modelf = #{orderModelf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_scope = #{orderScope,jdbcType=REAL}, order_descripe = #{orderDescripe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_address = #{orderAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_contact = #{orderContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_phone = #{orderPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_others = #{orderOthers,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_cost = #{orderCost,jdbcType=REAL}, order_pollution = #{orderPollution,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_moremoney = #{orderMoremoney,jdbcType=BIT} where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select order_id, user_id, op_id, order_state, order_createtime, order_time, evaluation_id, order_class, order_modelf, order_scope, order_descripe, order_address, order_contact, order_phone, order_others, order_cost, order_pollution, order_moremoney from userorder where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select order_id, user_id, op_id, order_state, order_createtime, order_time, evaluation_id, order_class, order_modelf, order_scope, order_descripe, order_address, order_contact, order_phone, order_others, order_cost, order_pollution, order_moremoney from userorder

select order_id, user_id, op_id, order_state, order_createtime, order_time, evaluation_id, order_class, order_modelf, order_scope, order_descripe, order_address, order_contact, order_phone, order_others, order_cost, order_pollution, order_moremoney from userorder where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
